site_title: Dollar Bill Glider 1 by Stephen Weiss

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Welcome back to our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Today we are making. paper plane 007, the Dollar Bill Glider 1 by Stephen Weiss. This model was intended to be folded with an American dollar bill. I don't have an American dollar bill and my Canadian money is made of plastic and really hard to fold. For this plane any paper will work, all you have to do is cut it in half along the long side and it will work find. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 006 : Gliding Butterfly by Makoto Yamaguchi", please find it at https://youtu.be/hiawYPdeyJM Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art
